patthana16.9:4.1: Abyākataṃ sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.9:4.2: Abyākataṃ sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.9:4.3: Abyākataṃ sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nasappaṭigho ca naakusalo nasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.9:5.6: Hetuyā pannarasa … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate pannarasa.
